current.homepage_sub_heading: Professional support for your Ubuntu deployments, from the experts at Canonical.
current.home_includes_copy:
• Enterprise grade security at an affordable price Access to the latest software and our proactive support services, including Landscape and the Canonical Livepatch Service.
  • Certified technology All major software vendors, hardware vendors, system integrators and cloud providers have certified their technologies on Ubuntu.
  • Access to our world-class technical team Always on access to the worldâ€™s leading Ubuntu desktop, server and cloud experts, all actively participating in open source projects.
  • 24/7 phone, portal and email support Around-the-clock coverage for Ubuntu deployments all over the world, and ability to track progress through the online portal.
  • IP legal assurance The Ubuntu Assurance Programme that provides indemnification against claims of intellectual property infringement.
  • Technical library The Canonical Knowledge Base exclusively available to Ubuntu Advantage subscribers, an online library of articles on technical issues.
current.home_featured_heading: Get the edge in cloud, server, and desktop efficiency.
current.home_featured_description: Ubuntu Advantage helps leading organisations around the world to manage their Ubuntu deployments in production. It includes:
current.home_landscape_description: With the Landscape systems management tool, you can automate updates and manage physical, virtual and cloud-based systems from a single interface. It's easy to set up, easy to use and requires no special hardware. It features:
current.home_landscape_list: Management at scale | Role-based access | Deploy or rollback security updates | Informative monitoring | Compliance reports
current.home_left_column_description: Following the end-of-life of Ubuntu 12.04 LTS, Canonical is offering Ubuntu 12.04 ESM, which provides important security fixes for the kernel and the most essential user space packages, included in Ubuntu Advantage.
current.home_mid_column_heading: Ubuntu on AWS gets serious performance boost
current.home_mid_column_description: Canonical has collaborated with AWS to develop an AWS-tuned kernel for Ubuntu 18.04 LTS and 16.04 LTS AMIs, with a 15% smaller footprint and up to 30% better boot performance.
current.home_right_column_heading: Learn how ITstrategen keeps their applications secure with Ubuntu
current.home_right_column_description: The security of customer data is of the utmost importance to ITstrategen, which is why Ubuntu is their server operating system of choice.
current.home_customers_heading: Ubuntu Advantage Customers
current.home_canonical_description: Canonical is the commercial sponsor of Ubuntu and the leading provider of enterprise services for Ubuntu OpenStack cloud deployments. Ubuntu delivers reliability, performance and interoperability to cloud and scale out environments. With developers, support staff and engineering centres all over the world, Canonical is uniquely positioned to help its partners and enterprise customers make the most of Ubuntu.
current.cart_promo_copy: The Ubuntu Advantage store is certified Level 1 PCI DSS compliant. Purchase with confidence.
current.tac_copy: I confirm acceptance to the terms of the services agreement for and on behalf of the company identified in the order.
current.footer_help_content: Should you have any questions about our support offering, or if you need assistance in purchasing, please contact us on: sales@canonical.com UK: +44 203 656 5291 USA: +1 737 204 0291 If you just need support for yourself, you can get help from the community, join a forum, or take a look at our official documentation.
current.footer_contact_content: If you have problems accessing your account, please contact us at: http://support.canonical.com/ More about Ubuntu Advantage: http://www.ubuntu.com/support/
current.footer_copyright_text: Canonical Ltd. Ubuntu and Canonical are registered trademarks of Canonical Ltd
current.collection_sub_heading: From basic office tasks to complex development work, Ubuntu Advantage gives your organisation all the support you need to deploy and manage Ubuntu.
